title: Frontend Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Upstep Academy is a leading educational institution committed to delivering innovative learning experiences that empower students to achieve their full potential. With a focus on personalized education and cutting\\-edge teaching methodologies, Upstep Academy strives to create a nurturing environment where learners can thrive academically and personally. Our dedicated team of educators and administrators work collaboratively to foster a culture of continuous improvement, inclusivity, and excellence. We are passionate about making quality education accessible and impactful, preparing students to succeed in a rapidly changing world.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a dynamic and dedicated Education Coordinator to join our team at Upstep Academy. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in managing educational programs, coordinating curriculum development, and supporting both students and faculty to ensure the delivery of high\\-quality education. This position requires a proactive individual with excellent organizational skills, strong communication abilities, and a passion for educational excellence. As an Education Coordinator, you will be instrumental in implementing innovative teaching strategies, overseeing academic activities, and ensuring that our educational standards are consistently met and exceeded.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Education, Administration, or a related field; a Masterâ€™s degree is preferred.
* Proven experience in educational program management or coordination.
* Strong understanding of curriculum development and instructional methodologies.
* Excellent organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams and stakeholders.
* Proficiency in using educational technology and management software.
* Demonstrated leadership skills and a commitment to continuous professional development.


**Responsibilities**
* Coordinate and oversee the development, implementation, and evaluation of educational programs and curricula.
* Support faculty in adopting innovative teaching methods and integrating technology into the classroom.
* Manage scheduling, resource allocation, and logistics for academic activities and events.
* Monitor student progress and provide support to ensure academic success and engagement.
* Facilitate communication between students, parents, faculty, and administrative staff to foster a collaborative learning environment.
* Assist in the recruitment, onboarding, and training of new educators and staff members.
* Ensure compliance with educational standards, policies, and accreditation requirements.
* Analyze feedback and assessment data to identify areas for improvement and implement action plans accordingly.
* Promote a positive and inclusive school culture that aligns with Upstep Academyâ€™s core values.


**Benefits**
 Upstep Academy offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employeesâ€™ well\\-being and professional growth. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and retirement plan options. Employees have access to ongoing training and development programs to enhance their skills and career advancement. We also provide a supportive work environment with opportunities for collaboration and innovation. Additionally, our staff enjoy flexible working arrangements and various employee recognition initiatives aimed at fostering a motivated and engaged workforce.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Upstep Academy is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are dedicated to providing a workplace free from discrimination and harassment. We encourage applications from individuals of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives, and we believe that a diverse team enhances our ability to serve our community effectively. We are committed to fostering a culture of respect, equity, and opportunity for everyone.

title: Front-End Developer Intern
description:
***Front\\-End Developer Intern (Unpaid)***




**Company** 
 : OSINT JOURNO
 



**Location** 
 : Remote
 



**Type** 
 : Internship
 



**Start Date** 
 : Immediate
 



**Duration** 
 : 3 months
 



  





**About OSINT JOURNO** 




 OSINT JOURNO is a media\\-tech startup focused on investigative journalism powered by Open Source Intelligence (OSINT). We build tools and platforms that empower journalists, researchers, and the public to discover the truth using transparent, verifiable data.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 We are looking for a passionate
 **Frontend Developer Intern** 
 to join our team. You'll work closely with our design and engineering team to bring UI designs to life and contribute to building responsive, accessible, and user\\-friendly web applications.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Convert Figma (or similar) UI/UX designs into responsive and interactive frontend components.
* Develop and maintain frontend features using
 **Next.js** 
 ,
 **Tailwind CSS** 
 , and modern JavaScript (ES6\\+).
* Collaborate with backend developers and designers to improve usability and performance.
* Optimize applications for speed and scalability.
* Write clean, maintainable code and contribute to code reviews.



  





**Requirements** 



* Proficiency in
 **Next.js.**
* Strong knowledge of
 **Tailwind CSS** 
 and modern HTML/CSS
* Ability to accurately translate UI/UX designs into pixel\\-perfect code
* Familiarity with Git and version control workflows
* Basic understanding of responsive design and cross\\-browser compatibility
* Good problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Passion for open\\-source, journalism, or social impact tech is a plus!



  





**Nice to have** 



* Experience with animation libraries (e.g., Framer Motion, GSAP)
* Experience with different component libraries.
* Understanding of web accessibility (a11y) best practices
* Familiarity with headless CMS (e.g., Sanity, Contentful)
* Prior contributions to open\\-source projects or personal portfolio



  





**What we offer** 



* Hands\\-on experience in a fast\\-paced startup environment
* Flexible working hours and remote work culture
* Mentorship and learning opportunities
* Opportunity to work on real\\-world impactful projects
* **Internship Certificate** 
 upon successful completion
* Letter of recommendation and potential full\\-time offer based on performance



  





**How to Apply** 




 ðŸ‘‰If you're excited about the intersection of technology, design, and impactful journalism, weâ€™d love to hear from you!
 



 ðŸ‘‰ Apply via
 **LinkedIn** 
 or send your resume,
 **portfolio/GitHub** 
 , and a brief note about why you're interested to
 **career@osintjourno.com**

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 TrackSmart Fleet Solution is a leading provider of innovative fleet management and telematics services. Dedicated to enhancing operational efficiency, safety, and compliance for transportation and logistics companies, we leverage cutting\\-edge technology to deliver real\\-time insights and comprehensive solutions. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction has positioned us as a trusted partner in the fleet management industry, serving clients across various sectors including logistics, delivery, and public transportation.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and detail\\-oriented Fleet Operations Coordinator to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing daily fleet operations, ensuring optimal vehicle performance, and maintaining compliance with industry regulations. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the efficiency and safety of our clients' fleet operations, utilizing innovative technology and data\\-driven insights.

**Responsibilities**

title: Backend Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Kanerika Inc is a leading technology solutions provider specializing in digital transformation and enterprise content management. With a focus on delivering innovative and scalable solutions, Kanerika Inc empowers organizations to optimize their digital experiences through cutting\\-edge platforms and services. Our commitment to excellence, continuous innovation, and customer\\-centric approach has established us as a trusted partner for businesses seeking to harness the power of digital technologies to drive growth and efficiency.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced AEM Backend Developer to join our dynamic digital platforms team at Kanerika Inc. The ideal candidate will possess strong backend development skills primarily in Java, with additional proficiency in Python. This role involves designing, developing, and maintaining scalable, maintainable Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) solutions that support our clientsâ€™ digital content strategies. The successful candidate will work closely with cross\\-functional teams including frontend developers, content authors, and system administrators to implement robust backend logic, custom workflows, integrations, and content management features.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should hold a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or possess equivalent work experience. Proven experience in delivering high\\-quality web applications, especially within the AEM environment, is essential. Candidates should demonstrate a solid understanding of backend development principles, along with hands\\-on experience in Java and Python programming. Familiarity with AEM architecture, including dispatcher, replication agents, and workflows, is required. Additionally, experience working with RESTful APIs, JSON/XML data handling, and version control systems such as Git is necessary. Knowledge of Agile development methodologies and tools like Maven and Jenkins will be advantageous.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The key responsibilities for this role include designing, developing, and maintaining AEM\\-based backend solutions, components, and templates that meet client requirements. You will develop custom AEM Sling models, servlets, services, and OSGi components to facilitate content management and delivery. Building and integrating RESTful services and APIs to support frontend applications and third\\-party systems will be a core part of your duties. Collaborating with frontend developers and content authors to ensure seamless dynamic content delivery is vital.
   

  

 Automation is a significant aspect of this role; hence, developing scripts using Java or Python for data handling, deployment automation, and reporting is expected. Implementing AEM workflows, managing user permissions, and controlling versioning for content are critical tasks to ensure efficient content lifecycle management. Troubleshooting and resolving technical issues within AEM environments will also be part of your responsibilities, along with optimizing system performance, scalability, and security configurations to meet high standards of reliability and security.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Kanerika Inc offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employeesâ€™ professional growth and personal well\\-being. Our benefits include competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and retirement plans. We promote a flexible work environment with opportunities for remote work and flexible hours. Employees have access to ongoing learning and development programs, including technical training and certifications, to enhance their skills. We also foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace culture that values diversity, innovation, and work\\-life balance. Additional perks may include performance\\-based incentives, paid time off, and participation in company\\-sponsored events and initiatives.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Kanerika Inc is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, or any other protected status. We believe in providing equal employment opportunities to all individuals and strive to create an environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to our collective success.

title: Java Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Stellar Consulting Solutions, LLC is a leading management consulting firm dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that drive business growth and operational excellence. With a strong reputation for excellence and a client\\-centric approach, we partner with organizations across various industries to optimize their strategies, processes, and technology implementations. Our team of experienced professionals is committed to fostering a collaborative environment that encourages continuous learning and development, ensuring our clients receive the highest quality services tailored to their unique needs.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and detail\\-oriented Business Analyst to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in analyzing business requirements, developing solutions, and supporting the implementation of strategic initiatives. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, and contribute to the growth and success of our clients. The Business Analyst will serve as a bridge between business stakeholders and technical teams, translating complex business needs into actionable technical specifications and ensuring project deliverables meet organizational goals.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The successful candidate should possess a bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field. A minimum of 3\\-5 years of experience in business analysis, consulting, or project management is required. Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, excellent communication abilities, and proficiency in process modeling tools such as Visio or Lucidchart are essential. Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in a fast\\-paced environment are highly desirable. Candidates should demonstrate a proactive attitude, exceptional organizational skills, and the ability to manage multiple priorities effectively.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The Business Analyst will be responsible for gathering and documenting business requirements through stakeholder interviews, workshops, and existing documentation review. They will analyze current processes, identify gaps, and recommend improvements aligned with strategic objectives. The role involves creating detailed functional specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria to facilitate development and testing phases. The Business Analyst will collaborate closely with project managers, developers, and QA teams to ensure solutions are delivered on time and within scope. Additionally, they will support change management efforts and provide ongoing support post\\-implementation to ensure optimal adoption and performance of new systems or processes.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Stellar Consulting Solutions, LLC offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employeesâ€™ well\\-being and professional growth. This includes competitive salary packages, health, dental, and vision insurance, and a retirement savings plan. We also provide paid time off, professional development opportunities, and a supportive work environment that encourages innovation and collaboration. Our commitment to work\\-life balance is reflected in flexible work arrangements and wellness programs aimed at fostering a healthy and productive workforce.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Stellar Consulting Solutions, LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our ability to serve our clients effectively and fosters a culture of respect, innovation, and excellence.

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
Do you want to fine\\-tune OpenAIâ€™s most advanced models on Azure â€” working with GPT\\-4\\.1, GPT\\-5, and beyond? From supervised fine\\-tuning (SFT) to reinforcement learning methods like DPO and others, this role puts you hands\\-on with the techniques shaping the future of AI.
   

  

 On this team, youâ€™ll play a key role in improving the performance and reliability of customizing some of the worldâ€™s most advanced AI models. Youâ€™ll gain hands\\-on experience with fine\\-tuning workflows, experimenting with reinforcement learning techniques, and applying advanced optimization strategies that directly impact product quality. Youâ€™ll also work directly with the training code, debug complex behaviors, and sharpen the skills that make cutting\\-edge models more reliable and effective. The models you help shape will power critical workloads at some of the worldâ€™s leading companies.
   

  

 Microsoftâ€™s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more, and weâ€™re dedicated to this mission across every aspect of our company. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. Join us and help shape the future of the world.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Responsibilities:**
**Coding**
* Leads by example across teams and mentors others to produce extensible, maintainable, well\\-tested, secure, and performant code used across products that adheres to design specifications. Leads efforts to continuously improve code performance, testability, maintainability, effectiveness, and cost, while learning about and accounting for relevant trade\\-offs. Identifies best practices and coding patterns (e.g., leveraging state\\-of\\-the\\-art generative artificial intelligence \\[GenAI], approaches to source code organization, naming conventions) and provides deep expertise in the coding and validation strategy. Creates and applies metrics to drive code quality and stability, appropriate coding patterns, and best practices. Identifies and anticipates blockers or unknowns during the development process, escalates them, communicates how they will impact timelines, and then leads efforts to identify and implement strategies and/or opportunities to address them.
* Leads efforts on using debugging tools, tests, logs, telemetry, and other methods, and proactively leads verification of assumptions while developing code before issues occur across products in production. Leverages minimal telemetry data, triangulates issues, and resolves with minimal iterations. Leads incident retrospectives to identify root causes of


 problems, the implementation of repair actions, and the identification of mechanisms to prevent incident recurrence. Proactively applies least\\-access principles, uses logging, telemetry, and other appropriate mechanisms to investigate issues while retaining privacy and security, and drives those practices across the team.
   

  

* Reviews product code and test code to ensure it meets team standards, contains the correct test coverage, and is appropriate for the product or solution area. Brings insight to code reviews to help improve code quality, coaching and providing feedback to develop other engineers' skills. Conducts code reviews in a timely fashion that helps accelerate the pace of development on the team. Considers diagnosability, reliability, testability, and maintainability when reviewing code, and understands when code is ready to be shared or delivered. Applies and reviews for coding patterns, security risks, compliance issues, and best practices in code reviews, providing feedback on code to drive adherence to best practices. Uses automated source code analysis tools that are incorporated into the build/development process.


**Design**
* Owns and leads efforts and discussions for the architecture of aspects of complex products/solutions (e.g., design, cost). Leads the testing and exploration of various design options across a set of complex product/solution scenarios, ensuring the strengths and weaknesses of each option are outlined and making recommendations for which design option is best. Creates proposals for architecture and design documents, and leads testing of hypotheses and proposed complex solutions. Shares and acts on findings from investigations, owns design decisions, and oversees the less experienced team members. Leads the development of design documents that support user stories and other product requirements. Evaluates new technologies to solve classes of problems, and determines how to integrate these technologies within existing systems. Leads design discussions with the team and shares findings/learnings from investigations, holding ownership for design decisions. Leads efforts to ensure system architecture and individual designs meet performance, scalability, resiliency, disaster recovery, cost of goods sold (COGS), and other requirements and expectations. Upholds Microsoft's standards of security, privacy, and other compliance requirements and expectations. Understands and coaches less experienced engineers on the importance of building solutions that expand upon the work of others. Leads the refinement of products through data analytics, and makes informed decisions in engineering products through data integration. Reviews complex designs/architectures within and across teams to provide recommendations for improvements.
* Mentors others on and independently creates a clear test strategy that ensures solution quality, prevents regression from being introduced into existing code. Mentors others on and independently ensures test plans incorporate security testing to validate security invariants (including negative cases). Leads adding new tests to cover gaps, deleting or fixing broken tests, and improving the speed, reliability, and defect localization of the overall test suite. Mentors others on, and builds testable code and considers testability during design for a set of solutions. Understands the different types of tests that can be done on a particular system (e.g., unit tests), and maintains up\\-to\\-date understanding of testing architectures used both across Microsoft and across the industry, and applies them across the architecture as appropriate. Designs and executes plans for redesigning or rearchitecting difficult or untestable sections of code for a set of solutions. Leverages artificial intelligence (AI) tools for test automation.


**Engineering Excellence**
* Applies and identifies best practices and shares information with other engineers for building code based on well\\-established methods and secure design principles while also applying best practices for new code development and formal validation of security invariants. Leads product development and scaling to customer requirements and applies best practices for meeting scaling needs and performance expectations and security promises.
* Remains current by investing time and effort into being informed staying abreast of current developments. Proactively seeks new knowledge, evaluating new trends, technical solutions, and patterns, assessing how to adapt them to current problems, and shares knowledge with other engineers. Conducts learning and literary sessions to raise awareness on relevant engineering design principles (e.g., security, testability, performance, scalability, accessibility, product knowledge).


**Qualifications**
**Preferred:**
* 10\\+ years of experience writing production code in building internet scale services and distributed systems.
* Engineering knowledge of machine learning systems and data pipelines.
* Experience mentoring other developers, working partners and being a team player.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills


**Required**
* Ability to debug, read code and work in a large codebase.


 Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.
   

  

 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Senior System Software Engineer
description:
NVIDIA has been transforming computer graphics, PC gaming, and accelerated computing for more than 25 years. Itâ€™s a unique legacy of innovation thatâ€™s fueled by great technologyâ€”and amazing people. Today, weâ€™re tapping into the unlimited potential of AI to define the next era of computing. An era in which our GPU acts as the brains of computers, robots, and self\\-driving cars that can understand the world. Doing whatâ€™s never been done before takes vision, innovation, and the worldâ€™s best talent. As an NVIDIAN, youâ€™ll be immersed in a diverse, supportive environment where everyone is inspired to do their best work. Come join the team and see how you can make a lasting impact on the world.
   

  

 Within NVIDIA, the Tegra Software unit is building chips, systems and software that are powering autonomous vehicles, gaming consoles, robotics platforms and AI at Edge for todays and tomorrowâ€™s needs. We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to tackle the challenges for the projects in video and multimedia areas that span from pre\\-silicon chips to complex use cases involving multimedia aspects. The team works on and develops performant, feature reach and safe multimedia software on Tegra Application Processors. The team also works on innovative video algorithms which help optimize video quality and streaming requirements of use cases. As a team member, you will be working to drive and deliver solutions for the latest and most exciting problems in video processing, pioneering video coding standards, performance, and power optimizations.
   

  

**What Youâ€™ll Be Doing**
* Build and deliver highly optimized system software for Video subsystem.
* Develop the Software in compliance with safety standards.
* Be accountable for results
* Make the right technical choices and tradeoffs governed by data driven development
* Collaborate with multi\\-functional software teams contributing to roadmap
* Optimize end to end use cases involving video subsystem
* Continuous improvement of quality and performance of the software and set a higher standard


**What We Need To See**
* Bachelor's or masterâ€™s degree in computers, Electrical, Electronics Engineering or related field
* A minimum of 10 years of experience in embedded SW development in video and multimedia processing.
* Strong technical abilities including experience in C programming, modern C\\+\\+, Python scripting
* Experience in digital video sub systems
* Experience in implementing video compression standards
* Established track record in formulating pre and post\\-processing algorithms for digital video pipelines.
* Experience of working on DL/ML and CV algorithms connected to video compression and multimedia systems.


**Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd**
* Knowledge of state of art Video compression standards
* Hands on implementation of algorithms in Cuda, Shaders on GPU.
* Exposure to DL/ML techniques on DL frameworks
* Experience in ARM architecture
* Knowledge of ASPICE and ISO â€“ 26262 safety standards


 If you are ready to compete on the cutting edge of technology and successfully implement world\\-class video solutions, we want to hear from you. Join us and become part of a team that's defining the future of computing!
   

  

 Widely considered to be one of the technology worldâ€™s most desirable employers, NVIDIA offers highly competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package. As you plan your future, see what we can offer to you and your family www.nvidiabenefits.com/

title: Automation engineer trainee
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Siebener Automation \\& Solution is an industry leader in designing, developing, and manufacturing special\\-purpose machines. We specialize in creating technologically advanced machines tailored to meet specific needs, providing end\\-to\\-end support from initial conceptualization to the sophisticated final product. Utilizing a highly specialized team, we assist in designing advanced tools and machinery, ensuring precise fulfillment of requirements regardless of their size. Our team of young engineers keeps us updated on the latest developments in software, hardware, and new technology applications, driving our success.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for an Automation Engineer Trainee at our location in Ernakulam. The trainee will be involved in troubleshooting, process control, and assisting in the implementation of automation and robotics systems. They will collaborate with the engineering team to ensure the development and maintenance of electrical systems, actively participating in the hands\\-on development and deployment of various automation projects.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Troubleshooting and Process Control skills
* Knowledge in Electrical Engineering
* Understanding of Automation and Robotics
* Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Automation, Robotics, or a related field
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
* Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 METRIX IT SOLUTIONS INC is a leading technology firm specializing in innovative cloud solutions, automation, and digital transformation services. With a commitment to excellence and a client\\-centric approach, we empower organizations across various industries to harness the full potential of cloud computing and automation technologies. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to delivering scalable, secure, and efficient IT solutions that drive business growth and operational excellence. At METRIX IT SOLUTIONS INC, we foster a collaborative environment that encourages continuous learning, innovation, and professional development, ensuring our employees stay ahead in the rapidly evolving technology landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Cloud Solutions Architect to join our dynamic team at METRIX IT SOLUTIONS INC. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of cloud infrastructure, automation, and DevOps practices, with proven expertise in designing and implementing complex cloud architectures. This role involves leading technical discussions, developing innovative solutions, and guiding teams and clients through the entire project lifecycle. The Cloud Solutions Architect will play a critical role in ensuring the delivery of secure, cost\\-effective, and scalable cloud environments aligned with industry best practices and frameworks such as the AWS Well\\-Architected Framework. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge cloud projects, mentor junior team members, and influence the technological direction of the organization.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a combination of technical expertise, certifications, and professional experience, including:
   

  

* 6 to 10 years of relevant experience in cloud architecture, automation, and DevOps practices.
* Proven hands\\-on experience with AWS services, scripting, and automation tools.
* Strong knowledge of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Azure ARM.
* Experience in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, AWS CodePipeline, GitLab CI, or Azure DevOps.
* Familiarity with containerization and orchestration platforms such as Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, and Helm.
* Mandatory cloud certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate, AWS Certified SysOps Administrator, or AWS Certified Developer â€“ Associate.
* Optional certifications in automation (RedHat Ansible, HashiCorp Terraform), CI/CD (Jenkins), and container orchestration (CKA, OpenShift certifications) are advantageous.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, communication, and leadership skills.


**Responsibilities**
 The key responsibilities include:
   

  

* Leading architecture and design discussions with both technical teams and clients to develop scalable, secure, and efficient cloud solutions.
* Implementing best practices aligned with AWS frameworks, focusing on cloud security, cost optimization, and automation.
* Managing and executing customer engagements, including new project proposals and existing environment enhancements.
* Mentoring and training team members to enhance their technical capabilities and foster a culture of continuous learning.
* Collaborating with application development teams to design, implement, and automate infrastructure on cloud platforms.
* Proactively identifying and addressing gaps or delays in project timelines, coordinating with leads and stakeholders to ensure timely delivery.
* Handling asset development and management, ensuring optimal utilization of resources.
* Supporting ongoing maintenance and improvement of cloud environments through automation, monitoring, and security enhancements.
* Driving continuous innovation by exploring new tools, techniques, and processes to improve stability, security, and efficiency.
* Providing expert guidance on cloud security best practices and compliance requirements to safeguard organizational data and assets.


**Benefits**
 METRIX IT SOLUTIONS INC offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' professional and personal growth. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance, and retirement plans. We promote a flexible work environment with opportunities for remote work and flexible hours to support work\\-life balance. Employees have access to ongoing training and certification programs to enhance their skills and stay current with industry trends. Additionally, we foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace culture that values diversity, innovation, and mutual respect. Our commitment to employee well\\-being is reflected in various wellness programs, recognition initiatives, and career development opportunities to ensure a fulfilling and rewarding career journey.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 METRIX IT SOLUTIONS INC is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Our hiring practices are based solely on qualifications, skills, and experience, ensuring that every individual has an equal opportunity to contribute and succeed within our organization.

title: .Net Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Dautom is a pioneering technology company dedicated to transforming the automotive industry through innovative solutions and cutting\\-edge technology. With a focus on automation, data\\-driven insights, and sustainable mobility, Dautom aims to enhance the driving experience while promoting environmentally friendly practices. Our team comprises passionate professionals committed to developing intelligent systems that improve safety, efficiency, and convenience for consumers and businesses alike. As a forward\\-thinking organization, Dautom continuously invests in research and development to stay at the forefront of automotive technology and to deliver impactful solutions that meet the evolving needs of the market.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and detail\\-oriented Software Engineer to join our dynamic team at Dautom. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software solutions that support our automotive automation systems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development, with experience in embedded systems, IoT, or related fields. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams including hardware engineers, data scientists, and product managers to create innovative products that align with our strategic goals. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge automotive technology and to contribute to projects that have a real\\-world impact on mobility and safety.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. A minimum of 3\\-5 years of experience in software development, particularly within the automotive or IoT sectors, is preferred. Proficiency in programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or Java is essential. Experience with embedded systems, real\\-time operating systems, and hardware interfacing is highly desirable. Strong problem\\-solving skills, excellent communication abilities, and the capacity to work effectively in a team environment are crucial. Familiarity with agile development methodologies and version control tools like Git is also required. Candidates should demonstrate a passion for innovation and a keen interest in automotive technology advancements.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Software Engineer at Dautom, your key responsibilities will include designing and implementing software modules for automotive automation systems, ensuring high performance, reliability, and safety standards. You will collaborate with hardware teams to integrate software with various sensors, actuators, and control units. Conduct thorough testing and debugging of software components to identify and resolve issues efficiently. Participate in code reviews and contribute to the development of technical documentation. You will also stay updated on emerging technologies and industry best practices to continuously improve our products. Additionally, you will support the deployment and maintenance of software solutions in real\\-world environments, providing technical support and troubleshooting as needed.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Dautom offers a competitive salary package commensurate with experience and expertise. Our comprehensive benefits include health insurance, paid time off, and professional development opportunities. We foster a collaborative and innovative work environment that encourages continuous learning and career growth. Employees have access to cutting\\-edge tools and resources to support their projects and initiatives. Additionally, Dautom promotes a healthy work\\-life balance and provides flexible working arrangements to accommodate individual needs. We are committed to recognizing and rewarding exceptional performance and contributions to our collective success.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Dautom is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Our recruitment and employment practices are designed to ensure fairness and equal access to opportunities for everyone. We believe that a diverse workforce fosters innovation and drives our success in delivering exceptional automotive solutions.

title: Senior Lead Software Engineer
description:
Voyager (94001\\), India, Bangalore, Karnataka
   

  

 Senior Lead Software Engineer
   

  

 Capital One has been a pioneer through our tech journey as the first large bank to go all in on the public cloud, while operating in a complex and highly regulated business environment. We have built out a large engineering organization, moved to the cloud, re\\-architected our applications and data platforms, and embraced machine learning at scale. Our AI/ML capabilities are now at the forefront of whatâ€™s possible in banking. (e.g., Capital One Eno).
   

  

 Still founder\\-led by Chairman and CEO Richard Fairbank, we dare to dream, disrupt and deliver a better way for our customers, the financial industry and for each other. Our goal is simple â€“ bring ingenuity, simplicity and humanity to an industry ripe for change.
   

  

 Our teams have built and battle tested new capabilities to meet those needs. Weâ€™ve open sourced several of the software tools we built (e.g., Cloud Custodian, Hygieia) and forged new partnerships with other digital leaders (e.g., Microsoft, MSFT).
   

  

**About The Team \\- Software Solutions**
 Through Capital Oneâ€™s journey to cloud, we've developed a suite of internal solutions uniquely designed to meet the challenges of a digital\\-first, cloud\\-first business at scale. We also recognize that many other businesses are facing similar data management needs as they accelerate their cloud and data journeys, and are exploring how best to bring some of the tools to the market.
   

  

**About The Role \\- Senior Lead Software Engineer**
 As a Senior Lead Software Engineer, you will:
   

  

* Go deep into our product and engineering solutions with the ability to learn quickly and lead innovative solutions to complex technical problems
* Champion the adoption of enterprise tech standards and architecture patterns. Advocate for open source, and internal re\\-use while maintaining knowledge on industry innovations, trends and practices to curate a continual stream of incubated projects and create rapid product prototypes
* Continuously improve the engineering culture by being engaged in recruitment and participating in community activities, conducting training, authoring blog posts, filing patents etc. Participate in technology events to support brand awareness of the organization and to attract top talent.
* Be the guiding force for stakeholders in design and architecture discussions, helping the engineering teams make key technology choices, and staying associated with the use case through its development lifecycle
* Effectively communicate with and influence key stakeholders across the enterprise at all levels of the organization. Proven collaborator and have the ability to build very strong partnerships with others to gain the trust and confidence of those around them, from hands on engineers to executives


**Basic Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related field
* Atleast 10 years of professional software engineering experience (internship experience does not apply)
* Atleast 5 years of experience in building software using at least 1 of the following: Golang, Java, Python, React (TypeScript), Rust, C\\+\\+
* Atleast 3 years of experience with a public cloud (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud)
* Atleast 1 year of experience with Big Data, Data Security, Data Management, Governance and Controls


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Master's Degree in Computer Science or a related field
* Atleast 12 years of professional software engineering experience (internship experience does not apply)
* Experience in building a product from the ground up
* History of building patent worthy solutions
* Atleast 5 years of experience in distributed microservices
* Atleast 7 years of experience in building software using at least 2 of the following: Golang, Java, Python, React (TypeScript), Rust, C\\+\\+
* Atleast 4 years of experience with AWS, GCP, Azure, or another cloud service
* Atleast 3 years of experience with Big Data, Data Security, Data Management, Governance and Controls
* Atleast 2 years of experience in Agile practices


 No agencies please. Capital One is an equal opportunity employer (EOE, including disability/vet) committed to non\\-discrimination in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local laws. Capital One promotes a drug\\-free workplace. Capital One will consider for employment qualified applicants with a criminal history in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable laws regarding criminal background inquiries, including, to the extent applicable, Article 23\\-A of the New York Correction Law; San Francisco, California Police Code Article 49, Sections 4901\\-4920; New York Cityâ€™s Fair Chance Act; Philadelphiaâ€™s Fair Criminal Records Screening Act; and other applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations regarding criminal background inquiries.
   

  

 If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation, please contact Capital One Recruiting at 1\\-800\\-304\\-9102 or via email at RecruitingAccommodation@capitalone.com. All information you provide will be kept confidential and will be used only to the extent required to provide needed reasonable accommodations.
   

  

 For technical support or questions about Capital One's recruiting process, please send an email to Careers@capitalone.com
   

  

 Capital One does not provide, endorse nor guarantee and is not liable for third\\-party products, services, educational tools or other information available through this site.
   

  

 Capital One Financial is made up of several different entities. Please note that any position posted in Canada is for Capital One Canada, any position posted in the United Kingdom is for Capital One Europe and any position posted in the Philippines is for Capital One Philippines Service Corp. (COPSSC).

title: Power Platform Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Pi Systems is a global consulting firm that helps small and mid\\-sized enterprises unlock growth through AI, Microsoft technologies, and strategic IT services. Pi Systems specializes in solving real\\-world challenges across logistics, healthcare, manufacturing, and financial services. With Microsoft\\-certified teams across India and the USA, Pi Systems designs, develops, and deploys tailored solutions to meet business requirements quickly. The company is dedicated to ethical delivery, measurable impact, and long\\-term trust.
 



  





**Job Summary:** 




 We are seeking an experienced Power Platform Developer with 4\\-7 years of hands\\-on experience to design, develop, and implement business solutions using Microsoft Power Platform, including Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Dataverse. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in creating low\\-code solutions, integrating with Microsoft 365 and other systems, and delivering scalable, user\\-friendly applications to drive business efficiency.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time hybrid role for a Power Platform Developer based in Chennai, with some work from home flexibility. The Power Platform Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI solutions. The developer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand business requirements, provide technical expertise, and ensure the successful deployment of solutions. Daily tasks will include working on custom enterprise builds, integrating systems, and maintaining high standards of code quality.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Solution Development** 
 : Design, develop, and deploy custom business applications using Power Apps to meet organizational needs.
* **Automation** 
 : Build and optimize automated workflows using Power Automate to streamline business processes and improve productivity.
* **Data Visualization** 
 : Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI to provide actionable insights from complex datasets.
* **Integration** 
 : Integrate Power Platform solutions with Microsoft 365, Azure, Dynamics 365, and third\\-party systems using connectors, APIs, and custom integrations.
* **Dataverse Management** 
 : Design and manage data models, tables, and relationships in Microsoft Dataverse to support scalable solutions.
* **Requirements Gathering** 
 : Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements, translating them into technical specifications.
* **Testing and Deployment** 
 : Conduct unit testing, troubleshoot issues, and ensure solutions are deployed effectively with minimal disruption.
* **Documentation** 
 : Create and maintain technical documentation, including solution architecture, user guides, and process flows.



  





**Required Qualifications** 



* **Experience** 
 : Minimum of 5 years of professional experience developing solutions with Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Dataverse), SharePoint, and Tableau.



  





**Technical Skills** 
 :
 


* Proficiency in building canvas and model\\-driven Power Apps.
* Expertise in creating complex workflows with Power Automate, including UI flows and business process flows.
* Strong knowledge of Power BI and Tableau for data modeling, DAX, and dashboard/report creation.
* Experience with Microsoft Dataverse for data management and customization.
* Familiarity with integration techniques using APIs, Azure Logic Apps, and Microsoft 365 services.
* Understanding of Power Platform governance, ALM (Application Lifecycle Management), and environment management.
* **Programming Knowledge** 
 : Experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Power Fx for customizations. Knowledge of C\\# or .NET is a plus.



  





**Soft Skills** 
 :
 


* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities to work with cross\\-functional teams.
* Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.



  





**Education** 
 : Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
 



  





**Certifications** 
 (Preferred):
 


* Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Experience with Dynamics 365 customization and integration.
* Knowledge of Azure services (e.g., Azure Functions, Azure DevOps) for extending Power Platform capabilities.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.

title: Sr Data Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Persistent Systems is a global leader in software solutions, digital transformation, and technology services. With a rich history of innovation and a commitment to excellence, Persistent Systems partners with organizations across various industries to deliver impactful technology solutions that drive business growth. Our company fosters a culture of continuous learning, collaboration, and inclusivity, ensuring our employees are empowered to achieve their full potential. We prioritize sustainability, diversity, and social responsibility, making Persistent Systems not just a workplace, but a community dedicated to making a positive difference.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Data Engineer to join our growing data team. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in SQL/PLSQL development, AWS cloud services, DBT (Data Build Tool), Python, and Snowflake. You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines and infrastructure to support analytics, reporting, and data science initiatives. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge data engineering projects in a dynamic environment, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to enable data\\-driven decision\\-making across the organization.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or related fields, with a minimum of 6\\+ years of professional experience in data engineering or related roles. Proficiency in SQL and PLSQL for data manipulation and performance tuning is essential. Hands\\-on experience with AWS cloud services such as S3, Glue, Lambda, Redshift, and EMR is required. Expertise in DBT for data transformation and modeling, along with proficiency in Python for scripting and automation, is vital. Candidates should have a good understanding of Snowflake architecture and development, as well as familiarity with data pipeline orchestration tools like Airflow or AWS Step Functions. Strong problem\\-solving skills, excellent communication abilities, and a proactive approach to learning and collaboration are also important for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The Senior Data Engineer will be responsible for a variety of critical tasks, including designing, developing, and optimizing robust ETL/ELT pipelines using SQL/PLSQL, DBT, and Python. Building and managing scalable data solutions on AWS infrastructure such as S3, Glue, Lambda, Redshift, and EMR will be a core part of your role. You will develop and maintain data models and transformations within Snowflake, ensuring data accuracy and consistency. Collaborating closely with data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand their data requirements and deliver effective solutions is essential. You will also be tasked with ensuring data quality, integrity, and governance across all pipelines, monitoring workflows, troubleshooting performance issues, and implementing best practices for data engineering, including CI/CD, version control, and testing. Additionally, mentoring junior engineers and contributing to team knowledge sharing will be vital to fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Persistent Systems offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' well\\-being and professional growth. This includes a competitive salary aligned with industry standards, along with various benefits such as health insurance, group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization coverage for employees and their families. Our culture emphasizes talent development, providing quarterly growth opportunities, company\\-sponsored higher education, and certifications to foster continuous learning. Employees also enjoy engagement initiatives such as project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards. Annual health check\\-ups are provided to promote health and wellness. We believe in creating a supportive environment where employees can thrive both professionally and personally.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity (in the last)
   

  

 Persistent Systems is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind and welcome applications from all qualified individuals, including those with disabilities, regardless of gender or gender preference. We support hybrid work arrangements and flexible hours to accommodate diverse lifestyles. Our office facilities are accessibility\\-friendly, equipped with ergonomic setups and assistive technologies to support employees with physical disabilities. If you have specific requirements, please inform us during the application process or at any point during your employment. We believe that diversity enriches our culture and drives innovation, and we are dedicated to providing an equitable environment for all.
   

  

 Let's unleash your full potential at Persistent Systems.
   

  

 Persistent is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.

title: Senior Salesforce Developer
description:
We are looking for
 **Senior Salesforce Developer** 
 for Fulltime position. Please find the multiple roles given below and let me know if you are interested and comfortable for any of these roles.
 



  





**Req:1\\)** 




**Senior Salesforce Developer** 




**Location: Hyderabad (Hybrid/ Remote)** 




**Timings: 3\\.30am IST \\- 12\\.30pm IST (Australia Time Zone)** 




  





**Senior Salesforce Developer** 




 5\\+ years of SFDC development experience
 


* Salesforce Certified Administrator, Salesforce Certified Platform Developer, Salesforce Platform Developerâ€”II Certification (highly desirable)
* Development experience with LWC, Apex, API REST integration, Triggers, Eclipse IDE, Salesforce Object Query Language (SOQL)
* Experience in working with Force.com Bulk API and the Metadata API



  





  





**Req:2\\)** 




**Senior Salesforce Developer** 




**Location: Hyderabad (Hybrid/ Remote)** 




**Timings: 3\\.30am IST \\- 12\\.30pm IST (Australia Time Zone)** 



* Lead the design, development, and implementation of custom Salesforce Service Cloud solutions, including automating processes, optimizing customer service workflows, and enhancing the user experience.
* Develop advanced Omnistudio components such as OmniScripts, DataRaptors, and Integration Procedures to automate and streamline business processes.
* Proven experience in Salesforce development, with a strong focus on Service Cloud and Omnistudio (minimum of 5 years).
* Expertise in developing and configuring Omnistudio components (OmniScripts, DataRaptors, Integration Procedures).
* Proficiency in Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Visualforce, and declarative Salesforce tools.
